description: Primary container for raw HydroVu sensor data and supporting files. HydroVu is the API platform that provides access to In-Situ Inc. water quality sonde data from monitoring stations along the Poudre River watershed.
purpose: Organize raw sensor measurements, field notes, credentials, and processing workflow files from the HydroVu monitoring network

subfolders.name: Incoming
subfolders.description: Temporary staging area for newly retrieved sensor data

subfolders.name: Archive
subfolders.description: Long-term storage for processed raw sensor data

subfolders.name: mWaterFieldNotes
subfolders.description: Field technician observations and maintenance records from mWater platform

data_workflow.step_1: API credentials loaded from Creds folder
data_workflow.step_2: Sensor data retrieved to Incoming folder
data_workflow.step_3: Field notes downloaded to mWaterFieldNotes folder
data_workflow.step_4: After processing, raw data moved to Archive folder
